name: The Tests
description:
A puzzle platformer where use your power of dash to complete levels and defeat enemies.

Controls:-

1.A,D/Left,Right or D-Pad to Move.

2.Space or 'B' on Controller to Jump.

3.Return or 'Y' on Controller to Dash.

4.Escape or 'Start' on Controller to Pause.

Link to Repo:- https://github.com/sps1112/The-Tests
